con:testStep.name: create title english translation in descriptions
con:testStep.con:description: 1) Go to http://i.meveo.info/meveo/loginInternal.jsf or the test environment you are currently running the test, login as meveo.admin. 2) Go to Configurations->International Settings->Descriptions 3) Click New Button 4) In Object type dropdown, select Titles and Civilities 5) In Language dropdown, select Eng 6) Click Search Button in Code. 7) In pop-up window, Input M in Code text field. 8) Click Search button. 9) Click the Item with M as code in the result below. 10) Input the text Mr in Description translation text field. 11) Click Save button.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Under Configurations->International Settings->Descriptions, there should be an entry for Title with Language as Eng and value as Mr.

con:request.name: create bom creation script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:create>\r
         <!--Optional:-->\r
         <createScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.${#TestSuite#ticket}BOMCreationScript" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}SCRIPT_INSTANCE">\r
            <!--Optional:-->\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.util.Map;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.catalog.PricePlanMatrix;
import org.meveo.service.catalog.impl.PricePlanMatrixService;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ${#TestSuite#ticket}BOMCreationScript extends Script {
  
  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#TestSuite#ticket}BOMCreationScript.class);
  
  	PricePlanMatrixService pricePlanMatrixService = (PricePlanMatrixService) getServiceInterface("PricePlanMatrixService");

	public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, Provider provider, User user) throws BusinessException{
		log.debug("start bom creation script...");
      
      	String ppPrefix = (String) context.get("prefix");
      
      	PricePlanMatrix ppInPlan = new PricePlanMatrix();
      	ppInPlan.setCode(ppPrefix + "_INCLUDED_IN_PLAN");
      	ppInPlan.setEventCode(ppPrefix + "_IN_PLAN_USAGE");
      	ppInPlan.setAmountWithoutTax(new BigDecimal(0));
      	ppInPlan.setAmountWithTax(new BigDecimal(0));
      
      	pricePlanMatrixService.create(ppInPlan, user, provider);
      
       	PricePlanMatrix ppOverPlan = new PricePlanMatrix();
      	ppOverPlan.setCode(ppPrefix + "_OVER_PLAN");
      	ppOverPlan.setEventCode(ppPrefix + "_OVER_PLAN_USAGE");
      	ppOverPlan.setAmountWithoutTaxEL("#{serviceTemplate.getCFValue('${#TestSuite#ticket}OVER_PRICE')}");
      	ppOverPlan.setAmountWithTaxEL("#{serviceTemplate.getCFValue('${#TestSuite#ticket}OVER_PRICE')}");
      
      	pricePlanMatrixService.create(ppOverPlan, user, provider);
      
      	PricePlanMatrix ppRecurring = new PricePlanMatrix();
      	ppRecurring.setCode(ppPrefix + "_RECURING");
      	ppRecurring.setEventCode(ppPrefix + "_RECURING");
      	ppRecurring.setAmountWithoutTaxEL("#{serviceTemplate.getCFValue('${#TestSuite#ticket}REC_PRICE')");
      	ppRecurring.setAmountWithTaxEL("#{serviceTemplate.getCFValue('${#TestSuite#ticket}REC_PRICE')");
      
      	pricePlanMatrixService.create(ppRecurring, user, provider);
      
      	log.debug("end bom creation script...");
	}

}
]]>
            </script>\r
         </createScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:create>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>
